DOC.brief_summary: The main focus observational study analyze possible effect cranberry dietary supplement intestinal microbiota woman recurrent uncomplicated urinary tract infection . In secondary analysis possible influence microbiota change recurrence frequency follow-up analyzed .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study With Mode Action-Analysis Cystorenal Cranberry Extract Patients With Recurrent Urinary Tract Infections
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : • chronic recurrent urinary tract infection ( ≥3 infection per year 2 infection last 6 month ) renal insufficiency ( GFR < 60 ) , anatomical know structural cause urinary tract infection regular consumption probiotic probiotic yogurt ( least 5x / week ) intake antibiotic last 4 week intake Marcumar simultaneous participation another study
